page.title: 06Titchfield Carnival Princess
page.content: One of the many features of the Carnival is the choosing of the Carnival Princess. She is selected at the Vicarage Fete in June or July. Anyone between the age of four and eleven is eligible to enter and the panel of judges changes every year. The Carnival Princess has two escorts and a reserve. The only duties are to be there on the day! In 1985 thirty six children entered and the judges were looking for things like prettiness, dress design and a winning smile.The Carnival Princess is the best thing about the Fete but there are many other items. For example every year a class from the small village school of Titchfield go to the Fete to do some dancing. There are also many games but personally I think the crowning of the Carnival Princess is the best aspect.
